records.name: Batuta Maldives Inn

location.address: Malaaz, Neruveli Magu, North Male Atoll

descriptions.hotel: The first thought that comes to mind, when we hear the word Maldives is that each island is famous for its crystalline serene waters with one hundred shades of blue, swaying coconut trees, and powdery white sand under the baby-blue skies. Batuta Maldives Inn is one of our third newly built properties which is the sister concern of Bututa Maldives Surf View and Batuta Maldives Fourson in Thulusdhoo owned by Batuta Maldives Travel and Tours Private Limited. Battuta Maldives Inn is one of the nearby bikini beach guesthouses in Thulusdhoo. Picturesque getaways where weary tourists can splash their pampers into the cerulean waters of the Indian Ocean and midst warm white sands and undulating coconut palms. Above all Thulusdhoo Beach, is a tourist hot spot throughout the year with most of the Thulusdhoo guesthouses near the beach. It is located in the northern part of the Maldives, called 'Paradise on Earth'. As a result, locals and foreigners regularly visit here to enjoy their vacations. Batuta Maldives Inn is one of the best budget Guesthouses in Thulusdhoo with luxurious amenities. We provide excellent service to our guests, making us one of the top 4-star categories in Thulusdhoo, Maldives. ***Property Policies*** Cancellation policy: 2 days before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, the guest(s) will be labeled to pay the full payment. Check in from 13:00 to 23:00 . Payment upon arrival by Cash and Credit Card, but extra Charge for credit card service fee. Taxes not included; Tourism GST 17.6% and 10% service charge will apply. A green tax of $3 per person per night will also be applied from 1st October 2016. Breakfast included. No curfew. Child friendly.
descriptions.direction: We have a speed boat transfer service from Male City via the airport. The speed boat will depart from Male City at 09:20 am, 12:20 pm, 04:20 pm, 08:20 pm, and 10:15 pm. Depart from the Male Airport at 9:30 a.m., 12:30 p.m., 4:30 p.m., 08:30 p.m., and 10:25 p.m. Speed boats depart from Thulusdhoo Island to the airport at 8:00 a.m., 10:30 a.m., 2:30 p.m., 05:30 p.m., and 7:30 p.m. On Fridays, the Speed boat departs from Thulusdhoo Island at 08:00 a.m., 03:00 p.m., 05:30 p.m., and 07:30 p.m. Depart from Male City at 09:20 am, 04:20 pm, 08:20 pm, and 10:15 pm. Depart from the Male Airport at 9:30 a.m., 4:30 p.m., 08:30 p.m., and 10:25 p.m. The speed boat transfer cost is 25 USD, payable directly to the boat. Kindly provide your flight details, and we'll reserve the speed boat seats for you, one of our representatives will meet you at the airport on your arrival and guide you to the boat. Note: We will arrange a special speed boat on demand at your arrival time in case the scheduled speed boat transfer is canceled. If you have any questions or concerns related to our services, please feel free to contact us. (Call/ WhatsApp - +9609104664/+919061767258) All of our team are happy to assist you. And the normal ferry services will be as usual as per schedule. Here are the details; Ferry service is available from Sat-Thurs at 14:30 hrs (province ferry) from Villingili ferry terminal, Male' and 15:30 hours (Tharikka 2) from the opposite side of the Villingili ferry terminal, Male city, in front of the Maldives Monetary Authority building. On Tue only at 14:30 hours, and on Fridays, the ferry leaves from Male City at 22:30 and reaches Thulusdhoo Island by midnight. The return ferry from the island leaves at 07:20 and 07:30 hours from Thulusdhoo and will reach Male City by 09:00 hours and 09:30 hours respectively. On Friday, the return ferry leaves from the island at 14:30 hours. A ferry ticket costs US$2 per person each way.
descriptions.general: Great care is taken to ensure guests experience comfort through top-notch services and amenities. Stay connected with your associates, as complimentary Wi-Fi is available during your entire visit.To facilitate your arrival and departure, you can pre-book airport transfer services prior to checking in.The hotel offers taxi, car hire and shuttle amenities for your ease in navigating around Maldive Islands.The hotel offers reception amenities including concierge service, express check-in or check-out, luggage storage and safety deposit boxes to ensure a comfortable stay for guests.Should you require assistance, the ticket service and tours can also aid in booking tickets and securing reservations at the finest shows and events in the vicinity.Whether you're here for an extended stay or simply require fresh garments, the hotel ensures your cherished travel attire remains spotless and accessible with the convenience of laundry service located on the premises.Your stay will be comfortable with the presence of room service and daily housekeeping as an in-room amenity for your relaxation and enjoyment.Need something at the last minute? The convenience stores has you covered, ensuring your requirements are met without any inconvenience. To ensure the well-being and convenience of all visitors, smoking is strictly prohibited throughout the entire hotel. Smoking is permitted solely in the specified smoking zones allocated by hotel.In order to ensure the utmost level of relaxation, the guestrooms feature an inviting design and are equipped with all basic necessities, creating a delightful stay experience.To ensure a pleasant stay, a selection of rooms at hotel come furnished with linen service, blackout curtains and air conditioning, all designed with your ease in mind.Several chosen accommodations at Batuta Maldives Fourson have a balcony or terrace incorporated into the room design. In select rooms, visitors can enjoy a touch of amusement with the availability of television, in-room video streaming and cable TV for their entertainment needs.Within specific rooms, a coffee or tea maker, bottled water, instant coffee and mini bar is conveniently available for your use.Understanding the significance of bathroom facilities in enhancing visitor contentment, hotel offers a hair dryer, toiletries and bathrobes within a few chosen chambers. Each day, arise to a delightful complimentary morning meal at Batuta Maldives Fourson.How about kicking off each day of your getaway with a delicious cup of coffee? At the hotel, relish in the invigorating taste of a freshly brewed, excellent coffee. Various excellent meal offerings at hotel ensure that enticing and easily accessible options are constantly available.Visitors with specific dietary needs can enjoy various culinary choices at Batuta Maldives Fourson, providing kosher and halal alternatives.Visitors wishing to create their personal culinary delights will appreciate the on-site BBQ facilities provided at this establishment. Throughout the day, engage in the entertaining activities available at Batuta Maldives Fourson.Make sure to discover the readily available beach at hotel.Unwind effortlessly each day by exploring the salon, conveniently situated within the hotel.
descriptions.other: Start your holiday, with a local travel experience: Batuta Maldives Inn is located near the bikini beach on the island of Thulusdhoo, which is a 90-minute traditional dhoni (boat) ride from Male, the capital city of Maldives. Enjoy the comfort and speed: Batuta Surf View also offers private speed boat transfers from Male, International Airport to Thulusdhoo Island, which will take about 30 minutes.
